However, talk of the former Nicole Scherzinger 's possible arrival has apparently got Cheryl Cole worried she will be eclipsed by her if they do work together on the series. A source told the Daily Mirror newspaper: Cheryl Cole 's been straight with Simon Cowell but suddenly people aren't returning her calls. She doesn't want to get into a put-up scrap with Nicole Scherzinger with Simon Cowell playing the puppet master. Although he wants Nicole Scherzinger , Simon Cowell still hasn't made a final decision on the line-up and his stalling is said to be concerning TV chiefs who want the judging panel to be signed off.

. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia was no longer fit for the job. This is simply a recognition that all businesses go through cycles and need new and different talent to manage through those cycles, Steve Ballmer wrote at the time. While Steve Ballmer was vague about the reasons, analysts believed that the CEO had lost faith in Muglia's ability to lead the company into the next generation of enterprise computing.

to step aside.In announcing the move Thursday, Eric Schmidt said that the company no longer needed his "adult supervision" and that Page, 38, was ready to run the world's leading internet company. , from a longtime senior Republican political aide who believes the "Why now?" question is exactly what leads to the answer that Mike Pence should run. This aide explained that 2012 would be Mike Pence 's moment: If you're a smart, ambitious, medium-age pol... do you want to run against John Thune and Mitt Romney and[ etc.] now? Or do you want to run against rock stars later? Among the names he rattled off for future presidential candidates were Paul Ryan, Bobby Jindal , Marco Rubio , Nikki Haley , Susana Martinez , John Kasich , and Rob Portman .
